articles.description: Avowed is a fairly straightforward RPG, but players may still benefit from a few of its unwritten rules before heading out into the Living Lands.
articles.content:
Summary
  • Avowed uses minimap and audio-guided exploration, not map markers, to lead players through the Living Lands.
  • Lockpicks are necessary for opening doors and chests in … [+7198 chars]

articles.title: New Steam Deck Update Gives Millions Of Users Improved Battery Life - Forbes
articles.description: 3 years in, Valve continues to improve the Steam Deck user experience with meaningful software updates. And the BEST update is one that improves battery life.
articles.content:
Steam Deck: Always improving
Jason Evangelho
The Steam Deck is three years old, so kudos to Valve for continuing to issue regular software and firmware updates to improve the overall user experienc… [+2330 chars]
